Mary Carl

  4. Location of Family: Hebron, NE
  5. Sending Organization: Foundling Hospital
  6. Arrival Place: Hebron, NE
  7. Age on Arrival:
  8. Date of Birth: 7/20/1908
  9. Date of Death: 10/6/1986
  10. Gender: female
  11. Married Name: Mary (Marie) Kingdon
